subject: Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The free agent Sean Casey reached a preliminary agreement on a one-year, $800,000 contract with the Boston Red Sox, giving them an experienced backup at first base to Kevin Youkilis. Casey hit .296 with four homers for the Detroit Tigers last season.
